name: zoom
short_description:
The "zoom" package ("System z object-oriented management) is a lightweight set
of Linux bash scripts that provide both a command line and a Web interface for
systems management of z/VM and Linux.

It is a Modified Version of Mz (the Standard Version) which was available on
the Internet at http://sourceforge.net/projects/managing-z/ until Dec 2013.

It is different from Mz in that all commands have been modified ('z' vs. 'mz'
prefix) and the data is in a different directory (/svr/zoom vs. /var/lib/mz).
Therefore zoom and Mz can co-exist on the same Linux system.
summary: Systems management of z/VM and Linux on the mainframe
